name: 管理決策財務分析
description:
1. To develop students the managerial decision based on revenue and profit through textbook guidance, paper review, case study and project presentation.
2. To introduce the research related managerial accounting technique including AHP, menu engineering, balanced scorecard, activity-based costing & management & budgeting and application to students.
3. To help students immediately apply different types of key management decisions for paper writing
goals: To develop students the managerial decision based on revenue and profit through textbook guidance, paper review, case study and project presentation.

To introduce the state-of-art managerial accounting technique, such as menu engineering, balanced scorecard, activity-based costing & management & budgeting and application on hospitality to students.
To help students immediately apply what they’ve learned to the types of key management decisions made in the hospitality industry.
